title: Iconic Home Glitzy Contemporary Royal Champagne Crystal-Border Cheval Mirror Jewelry Armoire
features: Modern full length jewelry armoire mirror; High gloss royal champagne finish with binged crystal border; Contemporary mosaic pattern; Convenient inner LED lighting; Lock and key for added security

Chic Home royal champagne full-length cheval mirror with crystal border is a blinged makeup vanity, furnishing, and space saving jewelry haven, ALLINONE This innovative modern design armoire is constructed with MDF ecofriendly wood in a clean smooth finish accentuated by inner LED lighting
description: Chic Home royal champagne full-length cheval mirror with crystal border is a blinged make-up vanity, furnishing, and space-saving jewelry haven, ALL-IN-ONE!This innovative modern design armoire is constructed with MDF eco-friendly wood in a clean smooth finish accentuated by inner LED lighting. The stunningly smooth mirrored exterior reveals a velvet storage interior that keeps your jewelry and little prized possessions neatly organized. Composed of 36 metal necklace hooks, five bracelet hooks, three bars that hold 75 earrings, cushioned holes that can fasten up to 50 rings or stud earrings, mini pouch for documents, six smartly divided compartments composed of four shelves for your make-up & beauty items, and two drawers for your fashion accessories. A convenient pull-out plate board and mirror completes your vanity set. Featuring a lock and key for extra security and a full length, real glass mirror that tilts at three angles, make dressing and grooming easy. Set Includes: Jewelry Armoire Cheval MirrorDimension: 18.5x14.6x57.7Style: ModernColor Options: Pristine White, Classic Silver, Royal Champagne, Elegant BlackMaterial: MirrorCare instructions: Easy to follow instructions for hassle free assemblyThe digital images we display have the most accurate color possible.
